session.speaker: David Vano
session.bio:
As Parasoft's CRO, Dave drives the overall strategy, vision, and execution of all customer-facing activities worldwide. He ensures that Parasoft is a dedicated partner in helping its customers deliver high-quality solutions faster and with less risk.

 Dave has more than 30 years of experience in technology, starting as a Cryptologic Technician in the U.S. Navy. Prior to joining Parasoft, Dave held a variety of senior go-to-market leadership positions with Micro Focus, NetIQ Corporation, and BMC Software. Dave retired from the U.S. Navy with over 20 years of service both in active duty and as a reservist. He holds a bachelorâ€™s degree from Excelsior College.
session.title: Eliminating Bottlenecks: Accelerating Development & Testing in a Complex Software Ecosystem
session.abstract:
Modern software development demands rapid iteration, seamless integration, and continuous testing across complex distributed systems.  However, dependencies on unavailable, costly, or evolving services create bottlenecks that hinder development and delay testing cycles. Traditional approaches fail to provide the flexibility and scalability required for efficient software delivery.

This session explores a methodology that enables teams to simulate dependencies with realistic, controlled responses, allowing development and testing to proceed uninterrupted.  By reducing constraints associated with third-party APIs, legacy systems, and evolving microservices, organizations can accelerate software delivery, improve test coverage, and enhance collaboration across teams. Attendees will learn how this approach integrates into CI/CD pipelines, supports automated testing strategies, and reduces operational costs while ensuring high software quality.

Join us to discover how adopting this strategy can transform the way your teams develop, test, and deploy software, eliminating common roadblocks that slow down innovation.
